description.value: On the first round of combat, if the false priest rolls Deception or Performance for initiative, creatures that haven’t acted yet are @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} to the false priest.

The false priest convinces someone of their omnipotence by attempting a Deception check compared to the creature’s Will DC. If successful, the target gains [[/r 1d8+4]] temporary Hit Points that last for 1 hour or until the false priest removes them by rebuking the target, whichever occurs first.

The false priest deals an extra [[/r 1d6 #precision]] precision damage to @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} creatures. This increases to [[/r 2d6 #precision]] against creatures @Compendium[pf2e.conditionspf2e.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Flat-Footed} due to the false priest’s @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.QNAVeNKtHA0EUw4X]{Feint} or deceiver’s surprise.

Frequency: once per hour;

Trigger: The false priest critically fails aDeception or Performance check;

Effect: The false priest @Compendium[pf2e.actionspf2e.Bcxarzksqt9ezrs6]{Stride}.

items.name: Alchemist's Tools (Used as 'Blessed Items' to fool marks)

description.value: This mobile collection of vials and chemicals can be used for simple alchemical tasks.
description.label: Description

description.value: Sometimes referred to as an alley bow by rogues or ruffians, this small crossbow fires small bolts that are sometimes used to deliver poison to the target. It’s small enough to be shot one-handed, but it still requires two hands to load.
description.label: Description

description.value: Shorter than traditional arrows but similar in construction, bolts are the ammunition used by crossbows.
description.label: Description

description.value: This piece of wood or silver is emblazoned with an image representing a deity. Some divine spellcasters, such as clerics, can use a religious symbol of their deity as a divine focus to use certain abilities and cast some spells. A religious symbol must be held in one hand to use it.
description.label: Description

description.value: This leather armor is reinforced with metal studs and sometimes small metal plates, providing most of the flexibility of leather armor with more robust protection.
description.label: Description

description.value: The rapier is a long and thin piercing blade with a basket hilt. It is prized among many as a dueling weapon.
description.label: Description
